snippet.title: Eternity: The Last Unicorn - Official Release Date Trailer [Fantasy RPG]
snippet.description:
Pursuit of Eternity starts on 5th of March 2019!

Wishlist the game on Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/714250/Eternity_The_Last_Unicorn/

Release date: 5th March 2019 (PC and PS4), Xbox One later 
Platforms: PC, PS4 and Xbox One

Eternity: The Last Unicorn is a classic RPG, with lore based on Norse mythology. Travel through mesmerizing locations, meet fantasy characters and fight to protect Elven immortality.

Follow us:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/1CEntertainment
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1c_entertainment/

#RPG #Fantasy #Eternity
